title: #186: The 1915 Armenian Genocide with Harut Sasournian and Mariette Soudjian
description: Today we discuss the Armenian Genocide with Harut Sasounian and Mariette Soudjian.  I lost family members during this tragedy.  It is beyond disgusting that the international community does not recognize the atrocities that were committed by the YOUNG TURKS and the Turkey.   Never forget and never forgive!
itunes:author: Sam Tripoli
